text: KRNB (105.7 MHz) is an urban adult contemporary-formatted radio station in the Dallasâ€“Fort Worth Metroplex. It is owned by Service Broadcasting Corporation alongside its sister station KKDA-FM. Its studios are located in Arlington, Texas and the transmitter/antenna tower is located north of its city of license, Decatur, Texas. Category:Dallas Category:Radio stations in the United States
title: KRNB
